actions_done: Cap de les anteriors
actions_done_EN: None of the above
interpretation: La vergonya corporal (o body shaming en anglès) és l'acte de criticar o ridiculitzar l'aparença física d'algú, sovint fent-lo sentir avergonyit, insegur o insuficient.
interpretation_EN: criticizing or ridiculing someone's physical appearance often making them feel ashamed insecure or inadequate
reasons: No hi ha  tant de controlor a les xarxes, es ha dir una persona s'amaga darrere d'un perfil i com ningú els coneix es pensen que tenen dret a opinar dels altres. Normalment són gent insegura de si mateixa que es projecta causant inseguritats i també un factor important és l'entorn ( si viuen en un entorn abusiu ho veuen correcte)
reasons_EN: there is not so much controller in the networks it has been said that a person hides behind a profile and since no one knows them they think they have the right to give an opinion about others they are usually insecure people who project themselves causing insecurities and also an important factor is the environment if they live in an abusive environment they see it as right
common_EN: Moderately common (2 out of 5 social media contents)

associated_words_EN: deformed ogre whale skeleton pan face

other_thoughts: En haver patit assetjament per la forma del meu cos, vaig desenvolupar un trastorn alimentari que va acabar en anèmia i una hospitalització. Encara que ara ja no tinc el trastorn, tinc una obsessió severa per veure'm sempre bé (maquillatge, cabell, vestuari), com si el meu valor depengués només d'això. Sé que no és veritat, però és complicat. Em van dir que ningú m’estimarà si no tinc un bon físic, i és una cosa que encara em afecta. Encara que ara rebi compliments i afalacs, segueixo sense creure-m’ho del tot.
other_thoughts_EN: after being bullied about my body shape, i developed an eating disorder that ended in anemia and hospitalization. even though i no longer have the disorder, i have a severe obsession with always looking good (makeup, hair, clothes), as if my self-worth depends on it alone. i know it's not true, but it's complicated. i was told that no one will love me if i don't have a good physique, and it's something that still affects me. even though i now receive compliments and flattery, i still don't quite believe it.

platforms: WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube, Reddit, Discord, Videojocs (p. ex. Roblox, LoL, Fortnite…)
actions_done: Comparar l’aparença física d’una persona amb la seva aparença anterior
actions_done_EN: Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look
agree_sentences: No passa res si me’n ric de comentaris i bromes sobre fotos dels cossos d’altres, Si mostres el teu cos a les xarxes socials, has d’acceptar tot tipus de comentaris
agree_sentences_EN: It's ok and acceptable to laugh about comments and jokes about photos of other people's bodies|If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments
interpretation: En general en internet no n'hi ha massa o cap repercusió si fas algun comentari sobre el cos d'algú. Això és per la llibertad d'expressió que internet ofereix. Si be no és mai correcte opinar sobre el cos d'algú sense conèixer a la persona i el seu context (i menys si no és directament a aquella persona), també crec que has de esperar que no tots els comentaris que rebis si publiques un video o foto siguin positius. Això no només s'aplica a l'estatura o el pes, sinó a qualsevol cosa que publiquis, sempre algú opinarà d'una manera diferent i de vegades ho expressarà de mala manera. Ara, aquests comentaris poden derivar en estrés per a la persona afectada? Sí. És culpa de aquesta persona el llegir y amoïnar-se per un comentari sense cap valor? Sí. I si una persona et contacta directament per a assetjar-te pel teu físic la/el bloquejes y ja está. Ara sí, si aquests comentaris es traslladen a la "vida real" això ja és un cas més seriós.
interpretation_EN: in general on the internet there is little or no repercussions if you make a comment about someone's body this is because of the freedom of expression that the internet offers if it is never right to comment on someone's body without knowing the person and their context (and even less if it is not directly to that person) i also think that you should expect that not all the comments you receive if you post a video or photo will be positive this doesn't just apply to height or weight but anything you post someone will always have a different opinion and sometimes they will express it in a bad way now can these comments lead to stress for the affected person? yes is it this person's fault for reading and getting upset over a worthless comment? yes and if a person contacts you directly to harass you because of your physical appearance you block him/her and that's it now yes if these comments are transferred to real life this is already a more serious case
reasons:
-Feminitat/Masculinitat
-Estatura/Forma del cos 
-Pes/falta de musculatura/Estil de vida no saludable
reasons_EN: femininity/masculinity height/body shape weight/lack of musculature/unhealthy lifestyle
common_EN: Not common at all (Never seen it)
target_groups: Comunitat LGBTIQA+, Dones, Homes, Persones grans, Persones racialitzades , Persones amb cossos no normatius (cossos que no s’ajusten a les normes de bellesa estàndard), Persones amb discapacitats, Nens, Nenes, Persones amb dificultats econòmiques
target_groups_EN: LGBTIQA+ community|Women|Men|Elderly people|People of color|Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)|Disabled people|Boys|Girls|People with economic difficulties
encountered_forms: Comentaris sobre l’aparença (p. ex. pes, alçada,…), Deformitats, Operacions estètiques.
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)
encountered_reaction: Ho vaig ignorar
associated_words:
(En castellà perque en català poca cosa he escoltat)
Enano/a
Gordo/a (y eufemismes) (no crec que dir gras a una persona sigui un insult ni motiu per ofendre's, no és despectiu sinó descriptiu.)
associated_words_EN: in spanish because i haven't heard much in catalan dwarf fat and euphemisms i don't think calling a person fat is an insult or a reason to be offended it's not derogatory but descriptive
social_do_enough_EN: Yes, they do enough
taken_stance: No, no em sento còmode fent-ho
taken_stance_EN: No, I don't feel comfortable doing so
who_turn_to: Amics/parella, Ho he comentar abans, però crec que superar les inseguritats corporals és una tasca de cada persona. Moltes vegades està en les mans de la víctima el acabar amb la humiliació
who_turn_to_EN: Friends/partners|Other: I mentioned it earlier, but I think overcoming body insecurities is a personal task. Many times, it's in the hands of the victim to put an end to the humiliation.
what_actions_support: Mecanismes de suport per a les víctimes
what_actions_support_EN: Support mechanisms for victims
other_thoughts: Crec que és massa difícil fer callar a les veus que no tenen bones intencions. És més fàcil que cada persona sàpiga ignorar aquests comentaris o prendre mesures de manera independent.
other_thoughts_EN: i think it is too difficult to silence the voices that do not have good intentions. it is easier for each person to know how to ignore such feedback or take action independently.

other_thoughts: Desgraciadamente esto es algo que va a seguir pasando porque la gente no es consciente de la gravedad del asunto y el anonimato que proporcionan las redes promueve a que las personas expongan sus comentarios despectivos. Ahora, creo que se debería enseñar a no dar tanta importancia a estos comentarios, es decir, que no afecten a tu salud física o mental.
other_thoughts_EN: unfortunately, this is something that will continue to happen because people are not aware of the seriousness of the matter and the anonymity provided by the networks encourages people to express their derogatory comments. now, i think you should be taught not to give so much importance to these comments, that is to say, that they do not affect your physical or mental health.

other_thoughts:
Considero que les persones adolescents són molt més susceptibles a patir els efectes d'aquest tema en el físic, en l'autoestima, en la salut mental, etc i és molt fàcil i perillós
que siguin propenses a patir trastorns de la conducta alimentària, ansietat, depressió, inseguretat, etc i s'ha d'intervenir a temps perquè tingui el menor impacte possible en els seus camins a l'adultesa. Tanmateix, més enllà de l'intervenció, el més important és la prevenció.
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that teenage people are much more susceptible to the effects of this issue in the physical, in the self-esteem, in the mental health, etc. and it is very easy and dangerous that are prone to suffer from eating disorders, anxiety, depression, insecurity, etc. and you must intervene in time so that it has the least possible impact on their paths to adulthood. however, beyond intervention, the most important thing is prevention.

other_thoughts: Antes estaba un poco subida de peso y por los comentarios y eso, empecé a evitar las fotos y vídeos, y en 3 meses bajé de peso muy sorprendentemente, dejando de comer y durmiendo todo lo posible para no sentir el hambre (y porque había leído q durmiendo se perdían calorías),y ahora recibo comentarios como que estoy más bonita, que tengo la cara más perfilada y q tengo mejor cuerpo, ahora me preocupa/incomoda subir de peso.
other_thoughts_EN: before i was a little overweight and because of the comments and that, i started to avoid photos and videos, and in 3 months i lost weight very surprisingly, stopping eating and sleeping as much as possible in order not to feel hungry (and because i had read that you lose calories while sleeping), and now i get comments like i am prettier, that i have a more defined face and that i have a better body, now i am worried/inconvenient about gaining weight.

other_thoughts: Crec que és sobretot un tema educatiu molt relacionat amb el capitalisme i el patriarcat. Se'ns educa per al consum de cossos i ens creiem que tot el que és public a les xarxes socials és per al nostre consum, i com a consumidors ens sentim amb la impunitat d'opinar.
other_thoughts_EN: i think it is mostly an educational issue very related to capitalism and patriarchy. we are educated for the consumption of bodies and we believe that everything that is public on social networks is for our consumption, and as consumers we feel with impunity to have an opinion.

actions_done: Cap de les anteriors
actions_done_EN: None of the above
interpretation: Riure's d'una persona a través d'internet per com és el seu cos
interpretation_EN: laughing at a person over the internet because of how their body is
reasons:
- falta de conseqüències negatives per a qui fa body shaming
- normalització de faltes de respecte i conductes discriminatòries diverses a les xarxes socials sota arguments com la "llibertat d'expressió", per exemple
(No és una causa, però la tendència a sobreexposar-nos a les xarxes socials crec que també es troba mediant la problemàtica)
reasons_EN: lack of negative consequences for those who do body shaming normalization of disrespect and various discriminatory behaviors in social networks under arguments such as freedom of expression for example it is not a cause but the tendency to overexpose ourselves on social networks i think is also mediating the problem

other_thoughts: No és el mateix humiliació corporal que criticar o expressar la teva opinió en contra de la normalització de malalties com l'obesitat o l'anorèxia. Penso que sense faltar al respecte a una persona en concret s'ha de poder criticar que es normalitzin trastorns de conducta alimentària.
other_thoughts_EN: it is not the same body humiliation as criticizing or expressing your opinion against the normalization of diseases such as obesity or anorexia. i think that without disrespecting a specific person, it should be possible to criticize the normalization of eating disorders.

encountered_reaction_EN: Ignored it|Deleted the content/block the user
associated_words: Qualsevol que es fica amb l’aparença fisica d’una perdona
associated_words_EN: anyone who messes with the physical appearance of a pardon
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance: No, no em sento còmode fent-ho
taken_stance_EN: No, I don't feel comfortable doing so
who_turn_to: Amics/parella, Familiars, Terapeutes, Treballadors/es juvenils
what_actions_support: Més educació i formació, Mecanismes de suport per a les víctimes, Més espais per parlar amb professionals a les escoles
what_actions_support_EN: More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: El problema més general és l’ús excessiu d’Internet i la falta de dissociació entre el món real i el virtual, especialment les xarxes socials. Aquestes estan regides per algoritmes que busquen interaccions, i el contingut polaritzant és el que més interaccions té, tant pels que li donen suport com els que s’oposen. S’hauria de fer servir plataformes digitals que facin servir algoritmes diferents, perquè intentar combatre el contingut ofensiu, tant a nivell de físic com polític, racial… només alimenta l’algorisme. El canvi real seria normalitzar cossos variats en tots els mitjans de comunicació i a nivell local.
other_thoughts_EN: the most general problem is the excessive use of the internet and the lack of dissociation between the real and virtual worlds, especially social networks. these are governed by algorithms that seek interactions, and polarizing content is the one that has the most interactions, both by those who support it and those who oppose it. digital platforms that use different algorithms should be used, because trying to combat offensive content, both physically and politically, racially... only feeds the algorithm. the real change would be to normalize diverse bodies in all media and at the local level.

other_thoughts: En terme general, crec que no s'hauria ni de ridiculitzar certs cossos ni felicitar-ne els altres, perque es pot ferir a les persones que no s'hi sentin representades i tinguin la necessitat de sentir-se acceptades i recompensades pel seu físic.  En definitiva, crec que no s'hauria d'opinar mai, i menys a traves de les xarxes, del cos d'algú, i entendre que molts cops escapa del fet de menjar sa o anar al gimnas. També dir que les persones que publiquen fotos del seu físic han de preveure que s'hi parlarà, però no han d'acceptar-ho ni callar, simplement ser-hi concients i estar preparats.
other_thoughts_EN: in general, i believe that certain bodies should neither be ridiculed nor complimented, because it can hurt people who don't feel represented and need to feel accepted and rewarded for their bodies. in short, i think that one should never have an opinion, and least of all through the networks, about someone's body, and understand that many times it escapes the fact of eating healthy or going to the gym. also saying that people who post photos of their physique should anticipate that it will be talked about, but they don't have to accept it or keep quiet, just be aware of it and be prepared.

actions_done_EN: None of the above

interpretation_EN: when they criticize another person's body because it doesn't meet the standards
reasons: Crec que és més fàcil fer aquest tipus de comentaris darrere d’una pantalla que cara a cara
reasons_EN: it's easier to make these kinds of comments behind a screen than face to face

encountered_forms: Comentaris sobre l’aparença (p. ex. pes, alçada,…), Comparar l’aparença física d’una persona amb la d’una altra, Memes o imatges que es burlen dels cossos o l’aparença física, Missatges privats sobre l’aparença (p. ex. pes, alçada,…) directament a la persona
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparisons to others|Memes or images mocking body types|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly
associated_words: No sabria dir quines paraules en concret, però qualsevol comentari cap al físic d’una persona (estigui fet amb intenció de fer mal o no) em sembla innecessari i, la gran majoria de vegades, humilliant.
associated_words_EN: any comment towards a person's physique whether made with the intention of harming or not seems to me unnecessary and the vast majority of times humiliating
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: Yes, frequently
who_turn_to: Treballadors/es juvenils, Terapeutes, Comunitat a internet, Amics/parella, Personal educatiu (professorat, monitors/es/is,…), Familiars
what_actions_support: Implicacions legals més severes per als autors, Més educació i formació, Mecanismes de suport per a les víctimes, Més espais per parlar amb professionals a les escoles, Processos de denúncia més estrictes
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools|Stricter reporting processes
other_thoughts: Crec que el més important és l’educació i penso que si desde ben petits ens ensenyessin a ser més tolerants ens estalviaríem molts disgustos. També penso que ha arribat un punt crític on hem normalitzat parlar de cosos aliens escudant-nos en comentaris com “si puja fotos a Internet s’exposa a que comentin coses que no li agradin” i ens oblidem de que el que hi ha darrere d’aquella publicació es una persona i que es molt probable que si la veiesis pel carrer no li fessis el mateix comentari que has deixat a la seva foto.
other_thoughts_EN: i think the most important thing is education and i think that if we were taught to be more tolerant from a young age we would save ourselves a lot of trouble. i also think that we have reached a critical point where we have normalized talking about foreign things, shielding ourselves with comments like "if you upload photos on the internet, you expose yourself to people commenting on things you don't like" and we forget that what is behind that publication is a person and that it is very likely that if you saw them on the street, you would not make the same comment that you left on their photo.

other_thoughts: Hauria de ser més fàcil denunciar a algú per aquest tipus de fets. Són coses que poden afectar molt a la víctima, que molts cops acostuma a ser jove i no ho vol parlar amb cap adult, i hauria d'haver alguna forma perquè pogués denunciar fàcilment, anònimament i de forma autònoma al autor de forma online.
other_thoughts_EN: it should be easier to report someone for this kind of thing. these are things that can greatly affect the victim, who often tends to be young and does not want to talk about it with any adult, and there should be some form so that he could easily, anonymously and autonomously report the perpetrator online.

reasons:
Una tendencia en la sociedad de creer que lo bonito y correcto es tener bien marcado el abdomen 

Una moda universal que perpetua lo anterior

Y una sociedad poco cocientetizada sobre los diferentes cuerpos y maneras de alimentarse de acuerdo a tus características físicas además de una falta inmensa de inteligencia emocional como puede ser la empatia
reasons_EN: a tendency in society to believe that the beautiful and correct thing is to have a well marked abdomen a universal fashion that perpetuates the above and a society that is not very aware of the different bodies and ways of eating according to your physical characteristics in addition to an immense lack of emotional intelligence such as empathy

other_thoughts: Simplemente respecto a preguntar que se han abordado con sus posibles respuestas, pienso que se debe tratar todo esto pero también hay que tener en cuenta que muchas posibles respuestas a estas cuestiones violan de manera directa la libertad de expresión que existe para bien o para mal, siendo una persona que ha sufrido bullying en general no solo por aspecto pienso y siento de manera absoluta que este tipo de cosas afectan al que es debil mentalmente y es algo que solo esa misma persona puede trabajar
other_thoughts_EN: simply regarding asking what has been addressed with its possible answers, i think that all of this should be addressed but we must also take into account that many possible answers to these questions directly violate the freedom of expression that exists for better or worse, being a person who has suffered bullying in general not only by appearance, i think and feel absolutely that this type of things affect those who are mentally weak and it is something that only that same person can work on.

other_thoughts: Μεγάλωσα σε ένα σπίτι που πάντα το να έχεις παραπάνω κιλά αποτελούσε πρόβλημα, και πάντα επιβραβευομουν όταν ήμουν αδύνατη, αυτό με ακολούθησε σε όλη την πορεία της ζωής μου, με αποτέλεσμα τα υπερφαγίκα επεισόδια, έντονες αυξομειώσεις βάρους, και αυτοκοινωνικο αποκλεισμό τις περιόδους που είμαι με παραπάνω κιλά.
other_thoughts_EN: i grew up in a home where being overweight was always a problem, and i was always rewarded when i was thin, this has followed me throughout my life, resulting in binge eating episodes, extreme weight fluctuations, and self-social exclusion during periods when i am overweight.

other_thoughts: At the end of the day, judging someone isn't a crime. These people are essentially judging you for your looks. My point being, we can't fight this legally. People need to be educated that it is not okay to hurt other people. You should only tell people what you would want to also hear. People in general have become judgemental. It is a general problem, not just body shaming, everything shaming. Peoples mindsets need to change. One thing however that i do not agree with is the muckbang obese influencers. Tuey are encouraging obesity which causes heart disease death etc. And all the vjews and comments and fame encourages them to get even fatter.
other_thoughts_EN: at the end of the day, judging someone isn't a crime. these people are essentially judging you for your looks. my point being, we can't fight this legally. people need to be educated that it is not okay to hurt other people. you should only tell people what you would also want to hear. people in general have become judgmental. it is a general problem, not just body shaming, everything shaming. people's mindsets need to change. one thing however that i do not agree with is the muckbang obese influencers. tuey are encouraging obesity which causes heart disease death etc. and all the vjews and comments and fame encourages them to get even fatter.

platforms: WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram, TikTok, X (παλαιότερα Twitter)
actions_done: Σχόλια για την εμφάνιση κάποιου (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Συγκρίσεις σωματικής εμφάνισης με άλλους, Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα
actions_done_EN: Commenting on appearance (e.g., weight, height)|Comparisons of physical appearances to others|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look
agree_sentences: Αν εκθέτεις το σώμα σου στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης, πρέπει να αποδέχεσαι κάθε είδους σχόλια, Οι influencers με μεγαλύτερα σώματα δίνουν κακό παράδειγμα για τη νεολαία, Είναι αποδεκτό να εκφράσω την άποψή μου για ένα σώμα που βλέπω στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης, Είναι εντάξει και αποδεκτό να γελάω με σχόλια και αστεία σε φωτογραφίες σωμάτων άλλων ανθρώπων
agree_sentences_EN: If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments|Influencers with plus-sized bodies represent a bad example for young people|It is acceptable to express my opinion on a body I see on social media|It's ok and acceptable to laugh about comments and jokes about photos of other people's bodies

common_EN: Moderately common (2 out of 5 social media contents)

target_groups_EN: Men|Boys|Girls|Elderly people|Women|People with economic difficulties|People of color|Disabled people|LGBTIQA+ community|Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)

associated_words: Ξέρω 3 χοντρούς ανθρωπους και είσαι οι 5 από αυτούς
associated_words_EN: i know 3 fat people and you are 5 of them
social_do_enough_EN: I am not sure
taken_stance_EN: Yes, occasionally
who_turn_to: Φίλους/σύντροφο, Ειδικοί Ψυχικής Υγείας
what_actions_support: Δεν πιστεύω ότι μπορούν να γίνουν πολλά για αυτό
what_actions_support_EN: I don't think much can be done about it
other_thoughts: Θα ακουστεί άσχημο αλλά το body shaming συμβαίνει διότι κάποιος εχει άσχημο σώμα, άρα δεν προσπαθεί να το βελτιώσει και αδιαφορεί για την σωματική του υγεία και διατροφή. Καλό θα είναι να δεχθεί Body shaming ώστε να κατανοήσει το πρόβλημα, μα αρχίσει να τον ενοχλεί ώστε να προσπαθήσει να το λύσει.
other_thoughts_EN: it will sound bad, but body shaming happens because someone has an ugly body, so they don't try to improve it and don't care about their physical health and diet. it would be good for him to accept body shaming so that he understands the problem, but it starts bothering him so that he can try to solve it.

other_thoughts: Το φαινόμενο είναι αρκετά ευρύ και εκτείνεται από τα δημόσια posts (θες και μπικινι μωρή τάδε) μέχρι την ανταλλαγή πιο προσωπικών φωτογραφιών σε app γνωριμιών (όπως "έχεις μικρά βυζιά" ή "έχεις άσχημο πέος"). Η ανεξέλεγκτη διάθεση περιεχομένου online δημιουργεί σύγχυση και ανταγωνιστικότητα - χρειάζεται παιδεία και ψυχολογική υποστήριξη - δόμιση, για όλους όσους έχουν πρόσβαση στο διαδίκτυο. Η εποχή αλλάζει, αλλά εμείς συνεχίζουμε να αφήνουμε τους εαυτούς μας και τους νεότερους ανθρώπους αθωράκιστους.
other_thoughts_EN: the phenomenon is quite broad and extends from public posts (you also want a bikini baby so and so) to sharing more personal photos on dating apps (like "you have small tits" or "you have an ugly penis"). the uncontrolled availability of content online creates confusion and competition - education and psychological support - building is needed, for everyone who has access to the internet. times are changing, but we continue to leave ourselves and younger people vulnerable.

other_thoughts: Τέτοιες κακόβουλες συμπεριφορές δε θα έπρεπε να διαμορφώνουν το θύμα. Αντιθέτως, χρειάζεται η κοινωνία (στην περίπτωση του online body shaming η διαδικτυακή κοινότητα) να κατακρίνει πρώτα τον/την θύτη, έτσι που ο ίδιος/ η ίδια θα νιώθει ενοχές. Επίσης, εκτός από τις ενοχές που θα προσφέρει στον θύτη η κοινότητα, θα πρέπει να υπάρξουν περισσότερες νομικές διαδικασίες για την εύρεση του ατόμου που ασκεί online body shaming και την εφαρμογή ποινής σε αυτό, αν γίνεται επανειλημμένα.
other_thoughts_EN: such malicious behavior should not shape the victim. instead, society (in the case of online body shaming, the online community) needs to criticize the abuser first, so that he/she will feel guilty. also, in addition to the guilt offered to the abuser by the community, there should be more legal procedures to find the person who engages in online body shaming and punish him if it is repeated.

what_actions_support_EN: More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools|Other: Less promotion of unrealistic beauty standards, as well as products to achieve such a look
other_thoughts: Όταν ήμουν στις αρχές της εφηβείας μου είχα διαβάσει ένα άρθρο για μία μαμά, της οποίας η θυμωμένη κόρη την αποκάλεσε ως προσβολή "χοντρή". Σύμφωνα με το άρθρο η μαμά εκείνη εξήγησε στην κόρη της πως το ότι είναι χοντρή είναι η πραγματικότητα, και όχι κάτι κακό ή προσβλητικό. Τότε μου είχε φανεί εξωφρενικό, μια "βλακεία" για να δικαιολογούνται όσοι βαριούνται να χάσουν βάρος. Στο σήμερα, 5-6 χρόνια μετά, βρίσκομαι στα διπλάσια κιλά, πρησμένη, γεμάτη σπυράκια, να παλεύω με τα ορμονικά μου και να μην βρίσκω με τίποτα νούμερο στα ρούχα. Είναι ένα από αυτά στη ζωή μου τα οποία με βοήθησαν να καταλάβω πως ξέρουμε πολύ λίγα για τους άλλους. Προσπαθώ κάθε μέρα να μιλάω για το ότι τα σώματά μας δεν είναι "τέλεια", δεν μπορούν να είναι και δεν πρέπει. Και προσπαθώ να μην κάνω οποιαδήποτε υπόθεση για τους ανθρώπους (ειδικά αρνητικές), είτε για το σώμα τους είτε για οτιδήποτε άλλο ♡
other_thoughts_EN: when i was in my early teens i read an article about a mom whose angry daughter called her "fat" as an insult. according to the article, that mom explained to her daughter that being fat is reality, and not something bad or offensive. at the time it seemed outrageous, a "stupid" excuse for those who are bored to lose weight. today, 5-6 years later, i'm at twice the weight, bloated, full of pimples, struggling with my hormones and can't find a size for anything. it is one of those things in my life that helped me understand that we know very little about others. i try every day to talk about how our bodies aren't "perfect", they can't be and they shouldn't be. and i try not to make any assumptions about people (especially negative ones), either about their bodies or anything else ♡

other_thoughts: Πολλοί νιώθουν ότι πίσω από μια οθόνη μπορούν να σχολιάσουν χωρίς δεύτερη σκέψη. Λέξεις που ποτέ δεν θα έλεγαν πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο, γράφονται σε δευτερόλεπτα κάτω από μια φωτογραφία ή ένα βίντεο. Οι πλατφόρμες όπως το Instagram και το TikTok προωθούν συχνά "τέλεια" σώματα μέσω φίλτρων, επεξεργασμένων εικόνων και influencers που παρουσιάζουν ένα μη ρεαλιστικό πρότυπο ζωής και εμφάνισης. Όσοι δεν "ταιριάζουν", γίνονται στόχος χλευασμού ή νιώθουν ανεπαρκείς. Ένα φαινομενικά "αστείο" σχόλιο μπορεί να προκαλέσει άγχος, κατάθλιψη, διατροφικές διαταραχές ή ακόμα και απομόνωση. Κάποιοι σταματούν να δημοσιεύουν, να φωτογραφίζονται ή ακόμα και να κοινωνικοποιούνται. Όταν ένα σχόλιο body shaming γίνεται viral ή παίρνει likes, δημιουργεί ένα αρνητικό "ρεύμα". Δεν είναι μόνο αυτός που έκανε το σχόλιο υπεύθυνος – είναι και όσοι το επιβραβεύουν. Αυτό που πολλοί περιγράφουν είναι το αίσθημα ότι πρέπει να "προστατεύσουν" τον εαυτό τους από τον δημόσιο λόγο, λες και φταίνε επειδή τόλμησαν να εκτεθούν στο διαδίκτυο. Είναι σαν να λέμε: “Αν δεν είσαι τέλειος, μη δημοσιεύεις τίποτα.” Και αυτό πρέπει να αλλάξει.
other_thoughts_EN: many feel that behind a screen they can comment without a second thought. words they would never say face to face are written in seconds under a photo or video. platforms like instagram and tiktok often promote "perfect" bodies through filters, edited images and influencers who present an unrealistic standard of living and appearance. those who don't "fit in" are ridiculed or made to feel inadequate. a seemingly "funny" comment can cause anxiety, depression, eating disorders or even isolation. some stop posting, taking pictures, or even socializing. when a body shaming comment goes viral or gets likes, it creates a negative "current". it is not only the person who made the comment who is responsible – it is also those who reward it. what many describe is a feeling of having to "protect" themselves from public discourse, as if they are to blame for daring to expose themselves online. it's like saying, "if you're not perfect, don't post anything." and that has to change.

actions_done: Συγκρίσεις σωματικής εμφάνισης με άλλους, Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα
actions_done_EN: Comparisons of physical appearances to others|Private messages on appearance (e.g. weight, height) in group chats about other people|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look
agree_sentences: Είναι αποδεκτό να εκφράσω την άποψή μου για ένα σώμα που βλέπω στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης, Αν εκθέτεις το σώμα σου στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης, πρέπει να αποδέχεσαι κάθε είδους σχόλια
agree_sentences_EN: It is acceptable to express my opinion on a body I see on social media|If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments

what_actions_support: Περισσότεροι χώροι συζητήσεων με επαγγελματίες στα σχολεία, Περισσότερη εκπαίδευση και κατάρτιση, Μηχανισμοί υποστήριξης για τα θύματα
what_actions_support_EN: More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims
other_thoughts: Το Online Body Shaming είναι ένα σοβαρό θέμα που μπορεί να επιβαρύνει σημαντικά τη ψυχική υγεία του θύματος και την αυτοεκτίμηση του. Είναι σημαντικό τα θύματα να μιλάνε σε ειδικούς ψυχικής υγείας για τα προβλήματα που αντιμετωπίζουν καθημερινά και να μην τα αγνοούν. Θεωρώ πως ο σωστός τρόπος να σταματήσει είναι μέσω της σωστής παιδείας, εκπαίδευσης και ενημέρωσης από τα σχολεία.
other_thoughts_EN: online body shaming is a serious issue that can take a significant toll on the victim's mental health and self-esteem. it is important that victims talk to mental health professionals about the problems they face every day and not ignore them. i think the right way to stop it is through proper education, training and information from schools.

other_thoughts_EN: i think it's a behavior that affects people a lot, especially younger girls and boys in adolescence and young adulthood who probably haven't developed defense mechanisms to not be affected.

other_thoughts: Στο διαδίκτυο, η ανωνυμία επιτρέπει σε πολλούς να εκφράσουν επιθέσεις χωρίς συνέπειες, κάτι που καθιστά το πρόβλημα ακόμα πιο έντονο. Είναι σημαντικό να ενθαρρύνουμε την αποδοχή του εαυτού μας και να δημιουργήσουμε μια πιο θετική και υποστηρικτική κουλτούρα, τόσο διαδικτυακά όσο και εκτός διαδικτύου.
other_thoughts_EN: on the internet, anonymity allows many to voice attacks without consequence, which makes the problem even more acute. it's important to encourage self-acceptance and create a more positive and supportive culture, both online and offline.

target_groups: Γυναίκες, Κορίτσια, Φυλετικές μειονότητες (People of Color - POC), Κοινότητα LGBTQIA+, Μη-συμβατικά σώματα (σώματα που δεν συμμορφώνονται με τα στερεοτυπικά πρότυπα ομορφιάς), Άτομα με αναπηρία, Ηλικιωμένοι, Άτομα με οικονομικές δυσκολίες, Αγόρια, Άνδρες
target_groups_EN: Women|Girls|People of color|LGBTIQA+ community|Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)|Disabled people|Elderly people|People with economic difficulties|Boys|Men
encountered_social: Instagram, TikTok, X (παλαιότερα Twitter), YouTube, Facebook, Telegram, Messenger
encountered_forms: Σχόλια για την εμφάνιση (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Memes ή εικόνες που χλευάζουν σωματότυπους, Προσωπικά/ιδιωτικά μηνύματα (DM) για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος)
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Memes or images mocking body types|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) in group chats about other people
encountered_reaction: Το αγνόησα
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: No, but I would like to
who_turn_to: Φίλους/σύντροφο, Μέλη οικογένειας, Διαδικτυακή κοινότητα, Ειδικοί Ψυχικής Υγείας
what_actions_support: Αυστηρότερες διαδικασίες καταγγελίας (report), Αυστηρότερες νομικές συνέπειες για τους δράστες, Περισσότερη εκπαίδευση και κατάρτιση, Μηχανισμοί υποστήριξης για τα θύματα, Περισσότεροι χώροι συζητήσεων με επαγγελματίες στα σχολεία
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter reporting processes|Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: Θεωρώ οτι πρέπει να εκπαιδευτούν οι χρήστες να κάνουν report οταν βλέπουν τετοιες συμπεριφορές online
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that users should be trained to report when they see such behaviors online

platforms: WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Messenger, YouTube, TikTok
actions_done: Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος)

interpretation: Σχολιασμός σωματότυπων των ανθρώπων που βλέπουμε online
interpretation_EN: commenting on body types of people we see online
reasons: Projecting: καθρεφτίζουμε τις πεποιθήσεις που μας έχουν περάσει οι άλλοι (πχ. Γονείς, κοινωνία) και που ίσως είχαμε ακούσει κάποια στιγμή στο παρελθόν και για το δικό μας σώμα.
reasons_EN: projecting: we mirror the beliefs that others have passed on to us e g parents society and that we may have heard at some point in the past about our own body

actions_done: Συγκρίσεις σωματικής εμφάνισης με άλλους, Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα
actions_done_EN: Comparisons of physical appearances to others|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look
interpretation: Κακεντρεχη σχόλια για την εξωτερική εμφάνιση κάποιου άλλου μέσω κοινωνικών δικτύων
interpretation_EN: rude comments about someone else's appearance via social media
reasons:
Χαμηλή αυτοπεποίθηση και ανασφάλεια από το άτομο που σχολιάζει αρνητικά 
Οικογένεια και η κοινωνία που μεγαλώσαμε συγκρίνοντας τους εαυτούς μας με τους αλλους
reasons_EN: low self confidence and insecurity from the person commenting negatively family and the society we grew up comparing ourselves to others
common: Πολύ συχνό (4 στις 5 περιπτώσεις περιεχομένου στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης - post, story, reel, comment κ.λπ)
common_EN: Very common (4 out of 5 social media contents)
target_groups: Γυναίκες, Κορίτσια, Μη-συμβατικά σώματα (σώματα που δεν συμμορφώνονται με τα στερεοτυπικά πρότυπα ομορφιάς), Κοινότητα LGBTQIA+, Φυλετικές μειονότητες (People of Color - POC), Άτομα με αναπηρία, Άτομα με οικονομικές δυσκολίες, Αγόρια, Άνδρες, Ηλικιωμένοι
target_groups_EN: Women|Girls|Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)|LGBTIQA+ community|People of color|Disabled people|People with economic difficulties|Boys|Men|Elderly people
encountered_forms: Σχόλια για την εμφάνιση (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Συγκρίσεις με άλλους, Memes ή εικόνες που χλευάζουν σωματότυπους, Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα, Προσωπικά/ιδιωτικά μηνύματα (DM) για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος)
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparisons to others|Memes or images mocking body types|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) in group chats about other people
encountered_reaction: Δεν ήμουν σε θέση να απαντήσω, Το αγνόησα
encountered_reaction_EN: I wasn't able to answer|Ignored it
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: Yes, occasionally
who_turn_to: Ειδικοί Ψυχικής Υγείας, Μέλη οικογένειας, Φίλους/σύντροφο, Σχολικό προσωπικό
what_actions_support: Αυστηρότερες διαδικασίες καταγγελίας (report), Αυστηρότερες νομικές συνέπειες για τους δράστες, Περισσότερη εκπαίδευση και κατάρτιση, Μηχανισμοί υποστήριξης για τα θύματα, Περισσότεροι χώροι συζητήσεων με επαγγελματίες στα σχολεία
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter reporting processes|Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts:
Ως επαγγελματίας υγείας θεωρώ πως το online body shaming επιδρά πάρα πολύ άσχημα στην ψυχική υγεία των νεαρών ιδίως ατόμων, που μπορεί να οδηγήσει μέχρι και σε επικίνδυνες ενέργειες βλέπε αυτοκτονικο ιδεασμο εφηβων ατόμων!
Έχουμε πολύ δρόμο ως κοινωνία για να αντιμετωπίσουμε αυτό το ζήτημα. Δεν πιστεύω πως θα μπορέσει να εξαλείφει αλλά έστω να μειωθεί και να οχυρωθουμε όλοι ώστε να μην μας επηρεάζει τόσο.
other_thoughts_EN: as a health professional, i believe that online body shaming has a very bad effect on the mental health of young people in particular, which can even lead to dangerous actions, see suicidal ideation of teenagers! we have a long way to go as a society to address this issue. i don't believe that it will be able to be eliminated, but at least reduced and we should all be fortified so that it does not affect us so much.

agree_sentences: Είναι πιο πιθανό να εκφράσω την άποψή μου για το σώμα κάποιου στο διαδίκτυο παρά στην πραγματική ζωή, Είναι αποδεκτό να εκφράσω την άποψή μου για ένα σώμα που βλέπω στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης
agree_sentences_EN: I am more likely to express my opinion on someone's body on the internet rather than in real life|It is acceptable to express my opinion on a body I see on social media
interpretation: Σχολιασμός- κριτική για το σώμα κάποιου στο διαδίκτυο
reasons: Η προώθηση συγκεκριμένων προτύπων  σωματοτυπων απο την καταναλωτική κουλτούρα της εποχής σε συνδυασμό με την ανωνυμία που προσφέρει το διαδίκτυο
reasons_EN: promotion of specific body type standards from the consumer culture of the time combined with the anonymity offered by the internet

taken_stance_EN: Yes, occasionally

other_thoughts: Είναι ένα κοινωνικό φαινόμενο που επηρεάζει όλους τους χρήστες των social media και μπορεί να βλάψει σε ακραίο βαθμό κάποιον. Η κοινωνική ομάδα στόχος για την αντιμετώπιση του είναι τα παιδιά και οι νέοι άνθρωποι που μέσα από την ενημέρωση και ευαισθητοποίηση τους σχετικά με το φαινόμενο θα καταφέρουν να το εξαλείψουν
other_thoughts_EN: it is a social phenomenon that affects all social media users and can harm someone to an extreme degree. the target social group for dealing with it is children and young people who, through their information and awareness about the phenomenon, will succeed in eliminating it

target_groups: Φυλετικές μειονότητες (People of Color - POC), Γυναίκες, Κοινότητα LGBTQIA+, Κορίτσια, Άτομα με αναπηρία, Μη-συμβατικά σώματα (σώματα που δεν συμμορφώνονται με τα στερεοτυπικά πρότυπα ομορφιάς), Άτομα με οικονομικές δυσκολίες, Ηλικιωμένοι, Αγόρια, Άνδρες
target_groups_EN: People of color|Women|LGBTIQA+ community|Girls|Disabled people|Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)|People with economic difficulties|Elderly people|Boys|Men
encountered_forms: Σχόλια για την εμφάνιση (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Συγκρίσεις με άλλους, Memes ή εικόνες που χλευάζουν σωματότυπους, Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα, Προσωπικά/ιδιωτικά μηνύματα (DM) για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος)
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparisons to others|Memes or images mocking body types|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) in group chats about other people
encountered_reaction: Υπερασπίστηκα τον εαυτό μου ή το θύμα, Αντέδρασα στο περιεχόμενο
encountered_reaction_EN: Defended myself or the victim|Engaged with the content
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: Yes, frequently
who_turn_to: Φίλους/σύντροφο, Ειδικοί Ψυχικής Υγείας, Μέλη οικογένειας, Youth workers, Σχολικό προσωπικό
what_actions_support: Περισσότερη εκπαίδευση και κατάρτιση, Μηχανισμοί υποστήριξης για τα θύματα, Περισσότεροι χώροι συζητήσεων με επαγγελματίες στα σχολεία
what_actions_support_EN: More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: Είναι πολύ σημαντικό να γίνεται τέτοιες έρευνες, και ακόμα πιο σημαντικό να υπάρχουν ομάδες ή συναντήσεις για να γίνονται συζητήσεις γύρω από αυτό το θέμα.
other_thoughts_EN: it is very important to do such research, and even more important to have groups or meetings to have discussions around this topic.

encountered_forms: Σχόλια για την εμφάνιση (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Συγκρίσεις της τωρινής σωματικής εμφάνισης κάποιου σε σχέση με το πως ήταν παλαιότερα, Προσωπικά/ιδιωτικά μηνύματα (DM) για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος), Ανταλλαγή σχολίων σε ιδιωτική ομαδική συνομιλία που αφορούν/ σχολιάζουν άλλους ανθρώπους για την εμφάνιση τους (π.χ. βάρος, ύψος)
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) in group chats about other people
encountered_reaction: Διέγραψα το περιεχόμενο/μπλόκαρα τον χρήστη, Αντέδρασα στο περιεχόμενο, Το κατήγγειλα, Το αγνόησα
encountered_reaction_EN: Deleted the content/block the user|Engaged with the content|Reported it|Ignored it
associated_words: Χοντρός, παρομοιώσεις με μεγάλα ζώα τύπου ελέφαντας, φώκια, φάλαινα
associated_words_EN: fat similes to large animals like elephant seal whale
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: Yes, frequently
who_turn_to: Ειδικοί Ψυχικής Υγείας, Μέλη οικογένειας, Φίλους/σύντροφο, Σχολικό προσωπικό, Διαδικτυακή κοινότητα
what_actions_support: Αυστηρότερες διαδικασίες καταγγελίας (report), Αυστηρότερες νομικές συνέπειες για τους δράστες, Περισσότερη εκπαίδευση και κατάρτιση, Μηχανισμοί υποστήριξης για τα θύματα, Περισσότεροι χώροι συζητήσεων με επαγγελματίες στα σχολεία
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter reporting processes|Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: Θεωρώ ότι το ζήτημα είναι βαθύτερο από απλά να μην σου αρέσει να μη σου ταιριάζει η εμφάνιση κάποιου άλλου και σχετίζεται περισσότερο με το πως βλέπεις τον εαυτό σου και πόσο τον εκτιμάς. Για να αντιμετωπιστεί το πρόβλημα στην πηγή του χρειάζονται εξειδικευμένη άνθρωποι να μιλάνε για την αυτό αποδοχή από μικρή ηλικία. Κατασταλτικά μιλώντας, τα μέσα πρέπει να λάβουν αυστηρότερα μέτρα προκειμένου οι καθημερινές αναφορές να κοιτάζονται σε βάθος και να έχουν ποινές (από ban στο app μέχρι πιθανά πρόστιμα)
other_thoughts_EN: i think the issue is deeper than just not liking someone else's appearance and it has more to do with how you see yourself and how much you value them. in order to deal with the problem at its source, specialized people are needed to talk about its acceptance from an early age. repressively speaking, the media should take stricter measures so that daily reports are looked into in depth and have penalties (from app bans to possible fines)

other_thoughts: Αν και θεωρώ το body shaming κάτι το γενικά αρνητικό. Πρέπει να προσέχουμε μην πάμε στο άλλο άκρο γιατί αν προωθούμε την παχυσαρκία αυτό θα δημιουργήσει μεγάλα προβλήματα. Το σωστό προσωπικά (για περιπτώσεις που μπορεί να παρθεί κάποια δράση) είναι να ωθουμε αυτά τα άτομα στην αυτόβελτίωση όχι βέβαια με το να τους ασκούμε bullying.
other_thoughts_EN: although i consider body shaming something generally negative. we have to be careful not to go to the other extreme because if we promote obesity it will create big problems. the right thing personally (for cases where some action can be taken) is to push these people to self-improvement, certainly not by bullying them.

actions_done: Uspoređivali nečiji trenutni fizički izgled u odnosu na to kako je osoba ranije izgledala
actions_done_EN: Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look
agree_sentences: Ako pokazujete svoje tijelo na društvenim mrežama, trebate prihvatiti sve vrste komentara, Influenceri/ce krupnije građe (plus-sized) loš su primjer za mlađe ljude, Prihvatljivo je izraziti svoje mišljenje o tijelu koje vidim na društvenim mrežama, U redu je i prihvatljivo smijati se komentarima i šalama na fotografije tuđih tijela
agree_sentences_EN: If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments|Influencers with plus-sized bodies represent a bad example for young people|It is acceptable to express my opinion on a body I see on social media|It's ok and acceptable to laugh about comments and jokes about photos of other people's bodies
reasons: Nisko samopouzdanje kod osoba koje vrijeđaju druge, anonimnost na internetu i manjak odgovornosti, pokušaj uklapanja u određene skupine na internetu
reasons_EN: low self confidence in people who insult others anonymity on the internet and lack of responsibility trying to fit into certain groups on the internet
common: Vrlo rijetko  (1 od 5 objava na društvenim mrežama)
common_EN: Slightly common (1 out of 5 social media contents)

encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look|Memes or images mocking body types
encountered_reaction: Ignorirao/la sam to
associated_words: Uglavnom da je tip tijela nezdrav (uglavnom komentari na pretilost)
associated_words_EN: mainly that the body type is unhealthy mainly comments on obesity
social_do_enough_EN: I am not sure
taken_stance_EN: Yes, occasionally
who_turn_to: Članovima obitelji, Terapeutima/kinjama, Prijateljima/partneru, Školskom osoblju, Osobama koje rade s mladima
what_actions_support: Omogućiti više prostora za razgovor s profesionalcima u školama, Organizirati više edukacija i treninga
what_actions_support_EN: More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools|More education and training
other_thoughts: Mislim da se više treba usredotočiti na edukaciju ljudi o tome što je zdravo, a što nije, i kako se ponašati prema drugima koji ne izgledaju isto kao "mi". Također smatram da prevelika restrikcija komentara na internetu nije dobra, jer može dovesti do profiltriranih objava koje također mogu biti štetne (na primjer, hvaljenje pretilosti i podržavanje takvog načina života). To bi se trebalo ugraditi u kulturu naroda, a ne rješavati isključivo zabranama i ograničenjima na internetu.
other_thoughts_EN: i think there needs to be more focus on educating people about what is healthy and what is not, and how to treat others who don't look like "us". i also think that too much restriction of comments on the internet is not good, because it can lead to filtered posts that can also be harmful (for example, praising obesity and supporting such a lifestyle). this should be incorporated into the culture of the people, and not solved exclusively by bans and restrictions on the internet.

other_thoughts: Smatram kako je važno razgovarati s mladima o tijelu i da ono što vidimo na internetu nije uvijek tako i u stvarnosti te im pokazati i primjere toga da se uvjere, a ne da je sve na riječima. Poticati ih da se međusobno podržavaju i bodre.
other_thoughts_EN: i think it is important to talk to young people about the body and that what we see on the internet is not always the case in reality, and to show them examples so that they can be convinced, and not that everything is just words. encourage them to support and encourage each other.

agree_sentences: Ako pokazujete svoje tijelo na društvenim mrežama, trebate prihvatiti sve vrste komentara, Influenceri/ce krupnije građe (plus-sized) loš su primjer za mlađe ljude
agree_sentences_EN: If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments|Influencers with plus-sized bodies represent a bad example for young people
interpretation: Ismijavanje ljudi koji promoviraju društveno i zdravstveno loš primjer tijela ili način života (debeli ljudi koji smatraju da je debljina zdrava i nema nikakvih posljedica i zahtijevaju da drugi to prihvate)
interpretation_EN: making fun of people who promote a socially and healthily poor body image or lifestyle (fat people who think fatness is healthy and has no consequences and demand that others accept it)

encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Comparisons to others|Comparing someone's physical appearance to how they used to look|Memes or images mocking body types|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly

encountered_reaction_EN: Ignored it|Reinforced the shame|Defended myself or the victim
social_do_enough_EN: Yes, they do enough
taken_stance_EN: No, but I would like to
who_turn_to: Članovima obitelji, Prijateljima/partneru, Sebi, shvatiti zašto se to događa i poboljšati, ILI jednostavno ne objavljivati slike i biti iznad toga da ih diraju komentari
who_turn_to_EN: Family members|Friends/partners|Other: To yourself, figure out why it's happening and improve
what_actions_support: Omogućiti više prostora za razgovor s profesionalcima u školama, Dati im resurse i savjetovanje da nauče kako raditi na sebi i biti bolji
what_actions_support_EN: More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools|Other: Give them resources and counseling to learn how to work on themselves and become better.
other_thoughts: Ljudi koji se fokusiraju na izgradnju sebe i svojeg samopouzdanja nemaju problema sa takvim komentarima i uvijek su voljni pomoć drugim ljudima u takvim situacijama, veliki poticaj na ovako nešto ljudima na internetu je kada ljudi potiču neki svoj pogled: "pretilost je dobra", neka potreba za šminkom ili operacijom, bilo kakvo nametanje nečeg što je objektivno loše. Svi znaju da je vježbanje ili bilo koji način aktivnosti zdrav. Ljudi koji medicinski ne mogu biti u "formu" su toliko mali broj i praktički nemaju neki doseg na društvenim medijima da bi oni bili neki protuargument. Internetske zajednicu uvijek podržavaju ljude koji se trude i rade. Kao i u stvarnom životu neće svi biti prijateljski i podržavati ostale i to je normalno. Nećemo ljude kažnjavati zato jer nas ne vole i jer nas vrijeđaju.
other_thoughts_EN: people who focus on building themselves and their self-confidence have no problem with such comments and are always willing to help other people in such situations, a big incentive for something like this to people on the internet is when people promote their own view: "obesity is good", some need for makeup or surgery, any imposition of something that is objectively bad. everyone knows that exercise or any form of activity is healthy. people who are medically unable to be "in shape" are such a small number and practically do not have any reach on social media that they would be a counter-argument. internet communities always support people who try and work. just like in real life, not everyone will be friendly and supportive of others and that's normal. we will not punish people because they do not like us and because they insult us.

other_thoughts: Smatram da bodyshaming iznimno jako utječe na mentalno zdravlje osobe. Svakako, svi bi trebali biti informirani o zdravom načinu života kakvo god tijelo imali bitno da zivimo zdravo, jedemo zdravo i uravnotezeno i krecemo se :) sve ono sto promovira suprotno od toga smatram jednako losim kao  i bodyshaming
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that body shaming has an extremely strong impact on a person's mental health. certainly, everyone should be informed about a healthy lifestyle, no matter what kind of body they have, it is important to live healthy, eat healthy and balanced and exercise :) i consider everything that promotes the opposite to be as bad as body shaming

other_thoughts: Mislim da postoje profili koji se na dobar i adekvatan nacin bave ovom temom, no nazalost njihov utjecaj niej dovoljan. I dalje mislim da mediji poput novinskih clanaka imaju veci utjecaj, a ne koriste ga u dobre svrhe
other_thoughts_EN: i think there are profiles that deal with this topic in a good and adequate way, but unfortunately their influence is not enough. i still think that the media, such as newspaper articles, have more influence, and they don't use it for good purposes

actions_done_EN: Private messages on appearance (e.g. weight, height) in group chats about other people
reasons: Pojedinci su nesigurni i frustrirani te smatraju da ako se netko "ne uklapa" u zadane standarde ljepote ili ako ne zadovoljava njihove neke preferencije da onda imaju pravo izreći neko svoje mišljenje..koje je u konacnici uvreda jer nitko ne trazi u tom trenu tvoje misljenje o necijem/svom tijelu...primjećujem još da često u komentarima kod žena ako iznose neke progresivne liberalne feministicke ideje/ stavove da muškarci u komentarima pišu šuti debela, nakazo itd. Ne vole bas slobodu govora pa valjda ako nekoga vrijeđaju na temelju fizickog izgleda da ce to najviše boljeti ili da je to jedini način na koji bi žena trebala biti u unterakciji..kroz percipiranje objektiviziranje i vrednovanje od strane muškaraca
reasons_EN: individuals are insecure and frustrated and think that if someone doesn't fit into the given beauty standards or if it doesn't meet their preferences then they have the right to express their opinion which is ultimately an insult because no one is asking for your opinion about someone's/their body at that moment i also notice that often in the comments of women if they express some progressive liberal feminist ideas/views men in the comments write shut up fat freak etc they don't really like freedom of speech so i guess if they insult someone based on their physical appearance that will hurt the most or that this is the only way a woman should be in an interaction through perception objectification and evaluation by men

other_thoughts: Ovisno o razlogu - visina je nesto na sto se ne moze utjecati, ali ako netko fizicki izgleda nezdravo, netko im treba na "lijepi nacin" objasniti da to nije dobro za njih, jer vjerovati da je imati neproporcionalne fizicke dimenzije sasvim ok takoder nije zdravo mentalno stanje i realisticni pogled na svijet. Nekad to nije samo jednostavno posramljivanje i ne, ne izgledaju sva tijela zdravo. Pretilost nije zezancija i dovodi do razlicitih zdravstvenih problema i glamurizirati pretilost umjesto zdravog nacina zivota i smatrati da bi svi trebali biti odusevljeni tom osobom je deluzija. Ako se anoreksija smatra mentalnom nestabilnoscu, tako se isto treba smatrati i za pretilost koja je samo obrnuta slika anoreksije. Body shaming je mozda los nacin, ali najcesce se ne dogada osobama koje izgledaju "normalno".
other_thoughts_EN: depending on the reason - height is something that cannot be influenced, but if someone physically looks unhealthy, someone needs to explain to them in a "nice way" that it is not good for them, because believing that having disproportionate physical dimensions is perfectly fine is also not a healthy mental state and a realistic view of the world. sometimes it's not just simple shaming and no, not all bodies look healthy. obesity is no joke and leads to various health problems, and to glamorize obesity instead of a healthy lifestyle and to think that everyone should be delighted with that person is a delusion. if anorexia is considered mental instability, the same should be considered for obesity, which is just the reverse image of anorexia. body shaming may be a bad way, but it usually doesn't happen to people who look "normal".

other_thoughts: Body shaming je prisutan svuda — od društvenih mreža do stvarnog života. Ljudi često komentiraju tuđa tijela bez razmišljanja koliko riječi mogu biti štetne. Smatram da je važno educirati društvo o prihvaćanju različitosti i promicati ljubav prema vlastitom tijelu. Mislim da je najtužnije kako su najčešće mete body shaminga mlade žene i djevojčice. Svi zaslužujemo osjećati se dobro u vlastitoj koži, bez osuđivanja drugih.
other_thoughts_EN: body shaming is present everywhere — from social networks to real life. people often comment on other people's bodies without thinking about how hurtful words can be. i believe that it is important to educate society about acceptance of diversity and to promote love for one's own body. i think the saddest thing is that the most frequent targets of body shaming are young women and girls. we all deserve to feel good in our own skin, without judging others.

other_thoughts: Body shaming je teško iskorijeniti ili čak smanjiti njegov online efekt na ljude. Teško je upravo zbog dostupnosti i anonimnosti na internetu. Te smatram da ekstremna borba protiv idealnih tipova tijela (mršavih) u kojoj se idealiziraju pretile osobe, nisu dobre jer promoviraju debljinu i na sebe vuku još vise negativnih komentara jer guranje debljih osoba u medijski prostor i nagovaranje javnosti da ih prihvati kao novi ideal ljepote dovodi do negativnih komentara. Potrebno je prvo proširiti dijapazon tijela koja nisu izgladnjelo mršava ili taman ponjuna (grudi i stražnjica). Ili kod muškaraca je potrebno ne stavljati u medijski prostor nabildana tijela jer većina muškaraca nije takva i muškarci i dječaci se nalaze pod sve većim okom javnosti o tome kako moraju ići u teretanu i živjeti neku zdravu kulturu koja odlazi u ekstrem. Malim neprimjetnim koracima udaljiti medijski pogled ljude od savršenih tijela i naviknuti ih na normalne kilaže i normalne izglede lica.
other_thoughts_EN: body shaming is hard to eradicate or even reduce its effect on people online. it is difficult precisely because of the availability and anonymity on the internet. and i think that the extreme fight against ideal body types (skinny), in which obese people are idealized, is not good because it promotes fatness and attracts even more negative comments, because pushing fat people into the media space and persuading the public to accept them as the new ideal of beauty leads to negative comments. first, it is necessary to expand the range of bodies that are not starvingly thin or just chubby (breasts and buttocks). or in the case of men, it is necessary not to put bulging bodies in the media because most men are not like that and men and boys are under the increasing public eye about how they must go to the gym and live a healthy culture that goes to the extreme. with small, imperceptible steps, the media gaze can distance people from perfect bodies and get them used to normal weights and normal facial appearances.

what_actions_support: Postrožiti pravne posljedice za počinitelje, Organizirati više edukacija i treninga, Organizirati mehanizme podrške za žrtve, Omogućiti više prostora za razgovor s profesionalcima u školama
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: Body shaming je mehanizam stvoren prvenstveno za posramljivanje žena. Smatram da su žene najčešće žrtve body shaminga. Od njih se očekuje savršenstvo; kao da je to nešto što je održivo ili uopće dostižno. Oštro osuđujem takvo ponašanje i iskreno se nadam da će društvo prestati komentirati ženski (ili bilo čiji) izgled. Iscrpljujuće je i naporno slušati o tome.
other_thoughts_EN: body shaming is a mechanism created primarily to shame women. i believe that women are the most frequent victims of body shaming. perfection is expected of them; as if it is something that is sustainable or even attainable. i strongly condemn such behavior and sincerely hope that society will stop commenting on women's (or anyone's) appearance. it is exhausting and tiring to hear about it.

other_thoughts: Considero que este tema devia ser mais abordado, pois as vítimas tendem a culpar-se. O body shaming não reflete o corpo delas, mas sim a intolerância de quem as julga. Ao conversarmos sobre este assunto podemos, efetivamente, lutar por ajudar quem precisa e consequentemente tornar o mundo real e online mais puro e humano.
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that this topic should be addressed more, as victims tend to blame themselves. body shaming does not reflect their bodies, but rather the intolerance of those who judge them. by talking about this subject we can effectively fight to help those in need and consequently make the real and online world more pure and human.

other_thoughts: Sou docente universitária há alguns anos, numa faculdade onde é muito fácil constatar empiricamente que os números dos estudos existentes em Portugal sobre incidência de problemas de saúde mental na Academia, não têm qualquer adesão à nossa realidade. Em abril passado tivemos o terceiro suicídio em 2 anos. Tudo tabu, o que leva a que a faculdade nem sequer admita justificações de faltas por nada remotamente próximo. Mesmo tabu, eu consigo sem pensar muito apontar 15 alunos que falaram disso comigo. Quando pergunto, nunca algum me disse não saber de 20 a 30 colegas na mesma situação ou pior. No meio disto, o verdadeiro tabu nem é este. É que a epidemia é idêntica entre docentes. Tofos os años há alguien que desiste e vai embora, mas suportamos torturas psicológicas variadas anos a fio  em claro síndrome de Estocolmo. E não, pior do que ousar ter uma depressão, só reaparecer na faculdade com o dobro do peso. justifica uma conversa previa dos colegas de equipa com o regente, pedindo-lhe que nao comente essa questão dado que o problema foi serio e ninguém lida bem com o facto de passar dos 45 aos 90kg em 3 meses. Náo é muito apreciado que as assistentes engordem ligeiramente. Ser “extravagante” (que ali significa não ser cinzento igual a todos), é uma outra forma de garantir uma curta carreira.
other_thoughts_EN: i have been a university professor for a few years, at a faculty where it is very easy to empirically verify that the numbers of existing studies in portugal on the incidence of mental health problems in the academy, have no connection with our reality. last april we had the third suicide in 2 years. everything is taboo, which leads to the fact that the college does not even allow excuses for absences for anything remotely close. even though it's taboo, i can without thinking too much point to 15 students who talked about this with me. when i ask, no one has ever told me that they don't know of 20 to 30 colleagues in the same situation or worse. in the midst of this, the real taboo isn't even this. the epidemic is identical among teachers. every year there is someone who gives up and leaves, but we endure varying psychological torture for years on end in clear stockholm syndrome. and no, worse than daring to have depression, only to reappear in college with twice the weight. justifies a prior conversation between teammates and the conductor, asking him not to comment on this issue given that the problem was serious and no one deals well with the fact of going from 45 to 90kg in 3 months. it is not very appreciated that assistants gain a little weight. being “extravagant” (which means not being gray like everyone else) is another way of guaranteeing a short career.

interpretation: Utilizar as redes sociais para comentar de forma pejorativa, através de publicações / comentários, aspetos físicos de alguém que publicou ; a cultura das redes sociais esteve durante muitos anos baseada na valorização do corpo atlético / magro e curvilíneo e tudo o que é fora do “padrao” pode ser alvo desse tipo de “shaming” , ainda para mais nas redes sociais
interpretation_EN: using social media to comment in a pejorative way through publications/comments physical aspects of someone who published; for many years social media culture has been based on valuing the athletic/thin and curvy body and anything that is outside the “standard” can be the target of this type of “shaming” especially on social media
reasons:
Facilidade de escrever um comentário atrás de um ecrã 
Sociedade de influencers que promovem o culto do corpo magro/curvilineo/atraente ; só postam se estiverem imaculadas 
Falta de auto estima e empatia
reasons_EN: ease of writing a comment behind a screen society of influencers that promote the cult of the slim/curvy/attractive body only post if they are immaculate lack of self esteem and empathy

occupation: A estudar (universidade ou outro), A trabalhar/estagiar

actions_done_EN: Comparisons of physical appearances to others

actions_done: Comparações sobre aparência física com outras pessoas
actions_done_EN: Comparisons of physical appearances to others
agree_sentences: Se mostras o teu corpo nas redes sociais, tens de aceitar todos os comentários
agree_sentences_EN: If you expose your body on social media, you need to accept all kinds of comments
interpretation: Vejo o body shaming on line como uma tentativa de humilhação de um certo corpo/ aparência , que tem como objetivo apenas criar insegurança, vergonha , sofrimento emocional na pessoa alvo.
interpretation_EN: attempt to humiliate a certain body/appearance which aims only to create insecurity shame and emotional suffering in the target person
reasons:
Acredito que a falta de sensibilidade por parte de um grande número de pessoas em relação a temas como body shaming possa ser uma das razões. A falta de consequências para as pessoas que praticam body shaming on-line não ajuda a que as pessoas simplesmente não digam/façam nada. Uma consequência para quem prática este tipo de agressão poderia ser ficar com a conta bloqueada. 
No entanto acredito que existem várias pessoas  que praticam este tipo de agressões apenas por malícia. Pessoas " que estão mal com o mundo" e até mesmo "mal consigo próprias" e que acabam por depositar/ descarregar as suas más energias, as suas inseguranças noutras pessoas que não merecem.
reasons_EN: the lack of sensitivity on the part of a large number of people regarding topics such as body shaming may be one of the reasons the lack of consequences for people who body shame online doesn't help that people just don't say/do anything a consequence for those who carry out this type of aggression could be having their account blocked however i believe that there are several people who carry out this type of aggression out of malice people who are bad with the world and even bad about themselves and who end up depositing/discharging their bad energy their insecurities on other people who don't deserve it
common_EN: Slightly common (1 out of 5 social media contents)
target_groups: Corpos não-conformes (corpos que não estão em conformidade com os tamanhos padrão e as normas de beleza), Pessoas LGBTQIA+ , Raparigas/meninas, Rapazes/meninos, Mulheres, Homens, People of color (POC), Pessoas com deficiência, Idosos, Pessoas com dificuldades económicas
target_groups_EN: Non Conforming Bodies (bodies that don't conform to standard sizes and beauty norms)|LGBTIQA+ community|Girls|Boys|Women|Men|People of color|Disabled people|Elderly people|People with economic difficulties

encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Memes or images mocking body types
encountered_reaction: Denunciei
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: No, but I would like to

actions_done_EN: Comparisons of physical appearances to others
reasons: Inseguranças; falta de respeito; incompreensão do outro
reasons_EN: insecurities lack of respect misunderstanding of the other
common_EN: Moderately common (2 out of 5 social media contents)
target_groups: Mulheres, Raparigas/meninas, Corpos não-conformes (corpos que não estão em conformidade com os tamanhos padrão e as normas de beleza), Pessoas com deficiência, Homens, Rapazes/meninos, People of color (POC), Pessoas LGBTQIA+ , Idosos, Pessoas com dificuldades económicas

encountered_forms: Comentários sobre a aparência (ex. peso, altura), Memes ou imagens a gozar com tipos de corpo, Mensagens diretas ou privadas sobre a aparência (ex. peso, altura), Mensagens privadas sobre outras pessoas em grupos
encountered_forms_EN: Comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height)|Memes or images mocking body types|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) to the person directly|Direct messages or private comments on appearance (e.g. weight, height...) in group chats about other people
encountered_reaction: Denunciei, Apaguei o conteúdo/bloqueei a pessoa
encountered_reaction_EN: Reported it|Deleted the content/block the user
social_do_enough_EN: No, they need to do more
taken_stance_EN: Yes, occasionally
who_turn_to: Terapeutas, Membros da família, Comunidades online
what_actions_support: Denúncias mais eficazes, Consequências legais mais sérias para os culpados, Mais educação e formação, Apoio específico para vítimas, Mais espaços de conversa com profissionais nas escolas
what_actions_support_EN: Stricter reporting processes|Stricter legal implications for perpetrators|More education and training|Support mechanisms for victims|More spaces for discussions with professionals in schools
other_thoughts: Penso que nos dias de hoje este tipo de comportamento está cada vez pior, e infelizmente, cada vez mais normalizado. Ao publicar uma foto numa rede social a sua repercussão e o tempo para circular e chegar a um elevado numero de pessoas pode ser enorme em questão de minutos, até segundos. Especialmente online, parece que as pessoas estão cada vez mais confortáveis para desrespeitar e atacar os outros baseando-se em ideais irreais e pouco acertados, com uma vista de corpo-padrão que é injusta e que foge ao real e normal de um ser humano
other_thoughts_EN: i think that nowadays this type of behavior is getting worse and worse, and unfortunately, more and more normalized. when publishing a photo on a social network, its repercussion and the time it takes to circulate and reach a large number of people can be enormous in a matter of minutes, even seconds. especially online, it seems that people are increasingly comfortable disrespecting and attacking others based on unrealistic and inaccurate ideals, with a standard view of the body that is unfair and deviates from what is real and normal for a human being.

taken_stance_EN: No, I don't feel comfortable doing so
who_turn_to: Comunidades online, Amizades / Parceiro/a, Terapeutas, Membros da família, No caso excepcional de obesidade, a própria pessoa têm de ajudar-se a si mesma, body shaming sempre existiu e sempre teve o propósito de servir como um aviso para a pessoa perceber que de facto não é saudável e que deve mudar os seus hábitos, mais vale ouvir a verdade cruel do que pedir aos outros que lhe mintam.
who_turn_to_EN: Online community|Friends/partners|Therapists|Family members|Other: In the exceptional case of obesity, the person has to help themselves, body shaming has always existed and has always had the purpose of serving as a warning for the person to realize that they are in fact not healthy and that they must change their habits, it is better to hear the cruel truth than to ask others to lie to you.
what_actions_support: Não acho que seja possível fazer muito sobre isso
what_actions_support_EN: I don't think much can be done about it
other_thoughts: Acredito que pessoas com deficiência não merecem ser julgadas pelo seu infortúnio e deveriam ser cuidadas pois a sua condição é irreversível, porém para quem têm a capacidade de melhorar a sua vida ao incorporar um estilo de vida saudável e opta por desperdiçar essa chance única que a vida dá é triste e vai ouvir sempre dos outros, é assim que a sociedade funciona e sempre funcionou. Há males que vêm para bem.
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that people with disabilities do not deserve to be judged for their misfortune and should be cared for because their condition is irreversible, however for those who have the ability to improve their lives by incorporating a healthy lifestyle and choose to waste this unique chance that life gives is sad and will always hear from others, this is how society works and has always worked. there are evils that come for good.

other_thoughts: Credo che ognuno debba e posare del proprio corpo ciò che ritenga più opportuno. La libertà è qualcosa di sacro che nessuno ha il diritto di intaccare. C'è chi prova ad esserlo e cerca di non dar peso al giudizio (non richiesto) della gente, ma nonostante questo resta vittima di questo fenomeno. Alla luce di questo credo che si dovrebbe trovare il modo di ostacolare gente che cerca di calpestare i propri simili sentendosi subiriore e calpestando la libertà altrui.
other_thoughts_EN: i believe that everyone should pose with their body what they deem most appropriate. freedom is something sacred that no one has the right to undermine. there are those who try to be one and try not to give weight to people's (unsolicited) judgment, but despite this they remain victims of this phenomenon. in light of this, i believe that a way should be found to hinder people who try to trample on their peers by feeling subjugated and trampling on the freedom of others.

encountered_reaction: L'ho segnalato, Ho interagito con il contenuto, Ho contribuito al body shaming, L'ho ignorato, Ho anche riso, Ho agito per difendermi o per difendere la vittima
encountered_reaction_EN: Reported it|Engaged with the content|Reinforced the shame|Ignored it|Other: I laughed|Defended myself or the victim
social_do_enough_EN: I am not sure
taken_stance: No, non mi sento a mio agio nel farlo
taken_stance_EN: No, I don't feel comfortable doing so
who_turn_to: Se X pubblica contenuti accessibili a tutti online allora X deve mettere in conto di poter ricevere critiche distruttive e costruttive, prese in giro ma anche consigli utili dal punto di vista della salute.
who_turn_to_EN: Other: If X publishes content that is accessible to everyone online, then X must expect to receive destructive and constructive criticism, mockery, but also helpful health advice.
what_actions_support: Non penso si possa fare molto al riguardo
what_actions_support_EN: I don't think much can be done about it
other_thoughts:
Condividere contenuti online espone al giudizio degli altri, positivo o negativo. Il body-shaming è spesso di cattivo gusto, dissacrante e inoltre può essere dannoso, alcuni lo vedono come una reazione naturale all'esposizione pubblica.
Ritengo deleteria questa voglia di "normalizzare"  a tutti i costi (per essere inclusivi?) uno stile di vita a volte scellerato (sia esso tendente all'obesità sia esso tendente all'eccessiva magrezza, o all'ossessione per il fisico perfetto) 
Chi è che stabilisce il limite tra la libertà di espressione e il rispetto per gli altri quando si commentano i corpi altrui online?

Ci sono dei social in cui postare determinati contenuti è più "sicuro", altri in cui si è più esposti a critiche/prese in giro. Se non sei d'accordo puoi sempre limitare i commenti
other_thoughts_EN: sharing content online exposes you to the judgment of others, positive or negative. body-shaming is often tasteless, desecrating and can also be harmful, with some seeing it as a natural reaction to public exposure. i consider this desire to "normalize" at all costs (to be inclusive?) a sometimes wicked lifestyle (whether it tends towards obesity or tends towards excessive thinness, or an obsession with the perfect physique) to be harmful. who draws the line between freedom of expression and respect for others when commenting on other people's bodies online? there are social networks where posting certain contents is "safer", others where you are more exposed to criticism/mockery. if you disagree you can always limit comments
